actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend section 317 of the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 with respect to contributions by separate segregated funds of Government contractors.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to repeal authority for the establishment of separate, segregated funds by Government contractors, including corporations and labor unions, for the purpose of influencing Federal elections.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 317 of the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 with respect to contributions by separate segregated funds of Government contractors.
